Update: If the weather is too warm and there is no snow. we will still meet for a walk instead.

Weston ski track is located at the Leo J Martin Memorial Golf Course on the Weston/Wellesley line, next to the 95/128 and Mass Turnpike interchange. They have an extensive grooming system and make snow when nature isn't creating enough.

Trail passes are $14. If you need to rent equipment, it is another $14. They have both skate and Nordic ski packages.

KEEP IN MIND THAT THIS IS PRESIDENTS' DAY WEEKEND when RSVPing.

The Weston Ski Track has 15 kilometers of trails. The track is actually made of a network of trails (also open for snowshoeing) that extends on both sides of the Charles River and create 5 different loops you can combine for several hours of ski.

Good to know in advance

More information and trailmap available on site or online at: www.ski-paddle.com

Restrooms in the main building
On-site: caf√© with snacks and beverages, water fountain, locker rooms for showers and changing
No reservation needed for the beginner lesson, but necessary for the lesson series: call (781) 891-6575

If the parking lot fills to capacity, go to the free overflow parking on the railroad side of Recreation Road
Weston Ski Track: 200 Park Road in
Weston, (781) 891-6575;
www.ski-paddle.com

Etiquette
Overtaking skiers must yield the right of way
Stopped skiers should move off the tracks to allow others to pass
Remove skis before crossing roads
Bring back your trash to the ski center

Heavy snow or rain cancels.

Questions? Call Joanna at 781-956-2099



Lunch Afterward
My daughter convinced me to change the restaurant to one of her favorite places in Wellesley...
Tian Fu
446 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02482

Tian Fu was recently rated as one of the top 100 Chinese restaurants in the United States, to read more see http://www.wickedloca...

They do not have a liquor license, so if you would like wine or beer with lunch, its BYOB.
